page.title: 04MY HOME -CIVIL SERVICE CLUB.
page.content:
I live at the Civil Service Club, and it is a nice place, and my mum and dad are the steward and the stewardess there. My garden is very big and there is a big sports field that I play in. We hold our Sports day there.
For my dinner if I had packed lunch, I could buy my things there. And my dad buys me things for school there and my mum helps my nan sometimes. I get some ice-cream sometimes. My mum and dad sometimes have days off and take my brothers and I out somewhere. And a lot of things go on up there. Things like cricket and football and rugby, draws, and tennis.
